org.opensaml.messaging.handler.impl

Class HTTPRequestValidationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.AbstractInitializableComponent
      • org.opensaml.messaging.handler.AbstractMessageHandler
        • org.opensaml.messaging.handler.impl.HTTPRequestValidationHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.Component, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.DestructableComponent, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.InitializableComponent, MessageHandler

    public class HTTPRequestValidationHandler
extends AbstractMessageHandler
    A message handler that checks basic HTTP request properties.
